data.description: The scope of this document is limited to the Enabler Release Definition of IGA 1.0 according to OMA Release process and the Enabler Release specification baseline listed in section 5.

This Requirement Document (RD) contains use cases and defines the requirements for the IGA (In-Game Advertising) Enabler. The following areas will be covered in this RD: • In-game advertising models • Gamer Interactivity of Advertisements • Game advertising Metrics The IGA Enabler will reuse as much as possible existing technologies. Some requirements may be covered by other OMA Enablers.
